snippet: GAWANDE--Trimbak Hari Dr. "Aba" Gawande, 92, of Cranbury, NJ was a beloved father, grandfather and great-grandfather. A lifelong educator, scholar and humanist, he was a school principal in central Indian villages, committed to eradicating the caste system and to equality in gender. His passion for history, philosophy and Indian classical music inspired all. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GAWANDE--Trimbak Hari Dr. "Aba" Gawande, 92, of Cranbury, NJ was a beloved father, grandfather and great-grandfather. A lifelong educator, scholar and humanist, he was a school principal in central Indian villages, committed to eradicating the caste system and to equality in gender. His passion for history, philosophy and Indian classical music inspired all. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GAWANDE, TRIMBAK HARI DR
